Text: hey how about some subs for us who dont speaky jappy

I can see two subtitles files: ING and PBTR but I haveno idea which language they are. I'm thinking ING meant ENG?

Would be really cool if someone could clarify...

Well, I was right. The files named "Space.Battleship.Yamato.Resurrection.2009.JAP.DVDRip.XviD-AXiNE.CD1 ING.srt" and "Space.Battleship.Yamato.Resurrection.2009.JAP.DVDRip.XviD-AXiNE.CD2 ING.srt" are English subtitles. The other two files are Portuguese subtitles.
